card.name: Swamp
card.property: B

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First to charge, first to fight.

card.name: Chalice of the Void
card.property: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

card.name: Creeping Mold
card.property: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The deadliest force on Mirrodin isn't the largest organism—it's the smallest.

card.name: Oblivion Stone
card.property: {4}, {T}: Put a fate counter on target permanent. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivion Stone: Destroy each nonland permanent without a fate counter on it, then remove all fate counters from all permanents.

card.name: Molder Slug
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fortunately for it, Mirrodin is a plane without salt.

card.name: Chromatic Sphere
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As expected, this sphere's design reflects the colors of the four moons . . . plus another?"—Pontifex, elder researcher

card.name: Nuisance Engine
card.property: {2}, {T}: Create a 0/1 colorless Pest artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Auriok children know the tale, "Bolgri and the Long Day of Squashing."

card.name: Heartwood Shard
card.property: {3}, {T} or {G}, {T}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like all other relics, it was left on the Radix by the elves to be destroyed. Unlike all other relics, it persisted.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Archers
card.property: Protection from artifacts; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are extensions of the Tangle, stretching its vines into the furthest reaches of the sky.

card.name: Auriok Transfixer
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My grandfather knew enough spells to fill a hundred scrolls. Nowadays, if a spell cannot fight the levelers, it is not even taught to our young."

card.name: Damping Matrix
card.property: Activated abilities of artifacts and creatures can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The priests tried cursing it. The mages tried dispelling it. In the end, they all obeyed it.

card.name: Atog
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Atog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Dominaria, a scavenger. On Mirrodin, a predator.

card.name: Lightning Greaves
card.property: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

card.name: Forge Armor
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Forge Armor, sacrifice an artifact. Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost.

card.name: Myr Adapter
card.property: Myr Adapter gets +1/+1 for each Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The simplest way to plan ahead is merely to be ready for everything."—Pontifex, elder researcher

card.name: Proteus Staff
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}: Put target creature on the bottom of its owner's library. That creature's controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of his or her library in any order. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Turn to Dust
card.property: Destroy target Equipment. Add {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin's inhabitants must be prepared for anything—including suddenly being unprepared.

card.name: Goblin Dirigible
card.property: Flying Goblin Dirigible doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Goblin Dirigible.

card.name: Banshee's Blade
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Banshee's Blade. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put a charge counter on Banshee's Blade. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Copper Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves thought of the myr as minor threats, just as the myr thought of the elves.

card.name: Golem-Skin Gauntlets
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each Equipment attached to it. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: B

card.name: Stalking Stones
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {6}: Stalking Stones becomes a 3/3 Elemental artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Ornithopter
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Regardless of the century, plane, or species, developing artificers never fail to invent the ornithopter.

card.name: Silver Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken saw the myr as toys, unaware of the intelligence lurking behind their empty eyes.

card.name: Fangren Hunter
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Big ones hunt the elves, so the elves hunt the small ones to keep them from getting big.

card.name: Talisman of Unity
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Talisman of Unity deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Great Furnace
card.property: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kuldotha, wellspring of molten metal, temple of the goblin horde.

card.name: Arrest
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unfortunately, it doesn't restrain the beast's smell."—Glissa Sunseeker

card.name: Krark-Clan Shaman
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Krark-Clan Shaman deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you mean, we're out of stuff to melt down? Give me your leg."

card.name: Scale of Chiss-Goria
card.property: Flash Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Charbelcher
card.property: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Goblin Charbelcher deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to target creature or player. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, Goblin Charbelcher deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Plains
card.property: W

card.name: Dead-Iron Sledge
card.property: Whenever equipped creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy both creatures. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Necrogen Mists
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mephidross filled with roars of fury and wails of despair as the leonin fought to keep their memories from being pulled into the mists.

card.name: Wizard Replica
card.property: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Wizard Replica: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Skyhunter Patrol
card.property: Flying, first strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are the first to raise the alarm when the levelers attack, and the first to risk their lives to defend the pride."—Raksha Golden Cub, leonin kha

card.name: Mourner's Shield
card.property: Imprint — When Mourner's Shield enters the battlefield, you may exile target card from a graveyard. {2}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by a source of your choice that shares a color with the exiled card.

card.name: Nim Lasher
card.property: Nim Lasher gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rotting metal feeds the necrogen mists, and in turn the mists feed the nim.

card.name: Titanium Golem
card.property: {1} {W}: Titanium Golem gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries before the first blades of the Razor Fields chimed in the wind, Mirrodin echoed with the golems' footsteps.

card.name: Galvanic Key
card.property: Flash {3}, {T}: Untap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A solution in search of a problem.

card.name: Leveler
card.property: When Leveler enters the battlefield, exile all cards from your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a century, the levelers rip through every corner of Mirrodin, obeying the commands of an unseen master.

card.name: Myr Mindservant
card.property: {2}, {T}: Shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It knows what you are planning, and does not approve.

card.name: Swamp
card.property: B

card.name: Tel-Jilad Exile
card.property: {1} {G}: Regenerate Tel-Jilad Exile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For his crimes, he was made to forget all the trolls' secrets. Now he knows only that he is outcast, but not why.

card.name: Spikeshot Goblin
card.property: {R}, {T}: Spikeshot Goblin deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path of a goblin shaman is a journey through a thousand ways of hurting people.

card.name: Blinding Beam
card.property: Choose one — • Tap two target creatures. • Creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step. Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Altar's Light
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The altar does nothing; the device is crushed under the weight of its own impurity."—Ushanti, leonin seer

card.name: Neurok Hoversail
card.property: Equipped creature has flying. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Soldier Replica
card.property: {1} {W}, Sacrifice Soldier Replica: Soldier Replica deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Wrench Mind
card.property: Target player discards two cards unless he or she discards an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is the sound of one head snapping?

card.name: Rustspore Ram
card.property: When Rustspore Ram enters the battlefield, destroy target Equipment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where herds have passed, the dented ground is lined with piles of rust.

card.name: Mindstorm Crown
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if you had no cards in hand at the beginning of this turn. If you had a card in hand, Mindstorm Crown deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Jinxed Choker
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, target opponent gains control of Jinxed Choker and puts a charge counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Choker deals damage to you equal to the number of charge counters on it. {3}: Put a charge counter on Jinxed Choker or remove one from it.

card.name: Extraplanar Lens
card.property: Imprint — When Extraplanar Lens enters the battlefield, you may exile target land you control. Whenever a land with the same name as the exiled card is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Last to charge, last to fall.

card.name: Triskelion
card.property: Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: Triskelion deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Forest
card.property: G

card.name: Reiver Demon
card.property: Flying When Reiver Demon enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all nonartifact, nonblack creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Shrapnel Blast
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Shrapnel Blast, sacrifice an artifact. Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Quicksilver Fountain
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts a flood counter on target non-Island land he or she controls of his or her choice. That land is an Island for as long as it has a flood counter on it. At the beginning of each end step, if all lands on the battlefield are Islands, remove all flood counters from them.

card.name: Leonin Den-Guard
card.property: As long as Leonin Den-Guard is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one under the four suns can elude the watchful eye of the den-guard.

card.name: Lodestone Myr
card.property: Trample Tap an untapped artifact you control: Lodestone Myr gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When necessary, myr can override and control any artificial object, as can their creator.

card.name: Loxodon Warhammer
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample and lifelink. Equip {3}

card.name: Relic Bane
card.property: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sword that has seen cowardice in battle exacts the price of honor from its wielder.

card.name: Tooth and Nail
card.property: Choose one — • Search your library for up to two creature cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library. • Put up to two creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Rust Elemental
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice an artifact other than Rust Elemental. If you can't, tap Rust Elemental and you lose 4 life.

card.name: Dream's Grip
card.property: Choose one — • Tap target permanent. • Untap target permanent. Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Arc-Slogger
card.property: {R}, Exile the top ten cards of your library: Arc-Slogger deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shuffling sound and the smell of ozone follow the slogger as surely as its electric tail.

card.name: Plains
card.property: W

card.name: Slith Strider
card.property: Whenever Slith Strider becomes blocked, draw a card. Whenever Slith Strider deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A slith's form and function are determined by the color of the sun under which it's born.

card.name: Contaminated Bond
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life.

card.name: Bosh, Iron Golem
card.property: Trample {3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets buried deep in his memory.

card.name: Island
card.property: U

card.name: Deconstruct
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing in this world, not even magic, likes to be caged."

card.name: Pearl Shard
card.property: {3}, {T} or {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leonin folktales claim it was brought from beyond the sky by the first kha.

card.name: Synod Sanctum
card.property: {2}, {T}: Exile target permanent you control. {2}, Sacrifice Synod Sanctum: Return all cards exiled with Synod Sanctum to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.property: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.

card.name: Chrome Mox
card.property: Imprint — When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors to your mana pool.

card.name: Farsight Mask
card.property: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, if Farsight Mask is untapped, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It turns the adversity of the moment into the knowledge of a lifetime.

card.name: Soul Nova
card.property: Exile target attacking creature and all Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within seconds, the nim was consumed in blinding sunfire. Afterwards, only a puddle of molten iron remained.

card.name: Woebearer
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Woebearer deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Lifespark Spellbomb
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice Lifespark Spellbomb: Until end of turn, target land becomes a 3/3 creature that's still a land. {1}, Sacrifice Lifespark Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Awaken that which was never asleep."—Spellbomb inscription

card.name: Swamp
card.property: B

card.name: Betrayal of Flesh
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target creature. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Entwine—Sacrifice three lands. (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Crystal Shard
card.property: {3}, {T} or {U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken know it is not of this world, so they know that this world is not the only one.

card.name: Vulshok Battlemaster
card.property: Haste When Vulshok Battlemaster enters the battlefield, attach all Equipment on the battlefield to it. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I could demonstrate how the leonin sunsplicer works, but then you'd be too dead to buy one."

card.name: Troll Ascetic
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's no coincidence that the oldest trolls are also the angriest.

card.name: Frogmite
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

card.name: Clockwork Dragon
card.property: Flying Clockwork Dragon enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Dragon attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat. {3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Dragon.

card.name: Isochron Scepter
card.property: Imprint — When Isochron Scepter enters the battlefield, you may exile an instant card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your hand. {2}, {T}: You may copy the exiled card. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Viridian Shaman
card.property: When Viridian Shaman enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Because the elves are so in touch with Mirrodin's nature, they understand best how to dismantle it.

card.name: Tangleroot
card.property: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, that player adds {G} to his or her mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As if there's glitch in the system, the Tangle sometimes folds in on itself, throwing off sparks of mana in a mystifying display.

card.name: Slith Predator
card.property: Trample Whenever Slith Predator deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born amid the molten metal of the Great Furnace, the slith have more than adapted to the perils of a metal world.

card.name: Psychogenic Probe
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability causes a player to shuffle his or her library, Psychogenic Probe deals 2 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The same devices sold as surgeons' tools in Lumengrid are sold as implements of torture in Mephidross.

card.name: Slith Firewalker
card.property: Haste Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.property: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Slith Ascendant
card.property: Flying Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instinctively drawn to the light of its "mother-sun," each slith follows that sun's path around Mirrodin.

card.name: Vorrac Battlehorns
card.property: Equipped creature has trample and can't be blocked by more than one creature. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Malachite Golem
card.property: {1} {G}: Malachite Golem gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries before the first branches of the Tangle gave shelter from the suns' cold light, the shadows of golems were Mirrodin's only shade.

card.name: Mass Hysteria
card.property: All creatures have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sooner you see the whites of their eyes, the sooner you'll spill the red of their blood.

card.name: Disciple of the Vault
card.property: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have target opponent lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He stands in the shadow of his lord, Geth, drinking in the dark energies of the Vault.

card.name: Molten Rain
card.property: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the molten rains fall, entire landscapes melt and flow away in rivulets of fire.

card.name: Tower of Eons
card.property: {8}, {T}: You gain 10 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its etchings tell the ur-golems' stories of an entity able to force life into a lifeless plane.

card.name: Vulshok Battlegear
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Bonesplitter
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Equip {1}

card.name: Mesmeric Orb
card.property: Whenever a permanent becomes untapped, that permanent's controller puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A step in one direction is two steps away from another.

card.name: Clockwork Condor
card.property: Flying Clockwork Condor enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Condor attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat.

card.name: Tower of Murmurs
card.property: {8}, {T}: Target player puts the top eight cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Etched on its surface are warnings from a long-lost race of ur-golems pushed to the brink of extinction.

card.name: Domineer
card.property: Enchant artifact creature You control enchanted artifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Since they haven't seen their original master for millennia, golems are eager to take orders from anyone.

card.name: Electrostatic Bolt
card.property: Electrostatic Bolt deals 2 damage to target creature. If it's an artifact creature, Electrostatic Bolt deals 4 damage to it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to avoid electric shock when the entire plane is metallic.

card.name: Liar's Pendulum
card.property: {2}, {T}: Choose a card name. Target opponent guesses whether a card with that name is in your hand. You may reveal your hand. If you do and your opponent guessed wrong, draw a card.

card.name: Blinkmoth Well
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Tap target noncreature artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When dictated by blinkmoth migratory patterns, clouds of tiny lights well up from Mirrodin's core.

card.name: Fireshrieker
card.property: Equipped creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mindslaver
card.property: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Mindslaver: You control target player during that player's next turn. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for the player.)

card.name: Dragon Blood
card.property: {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single drop turns skin to scale and fist to claw.

card.name: Glimmervoid
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if you control no artifacts, sacrifice Glimmervoid. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An empty canvas holds infinite possibilities.

card.name: Broodstar
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying Broodstar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.

card.name: Granite Shard
card.property: {3}, {T} or {R}, {T}: Granite Shard deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's a piece of a world the goblins have never seen but would dearly like to blow up.

card.name: Skyhunter Cub
card.property: As long as Skyhunter Cub is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every young leonin wishes to become a skyhunter, for they soar closest to the suns.

card.name: Second Sunrise
card.property: Each player returns to the battlefield all artifact, creature, enchantment, and land cards in his or her graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bright tunnel sometimes leads back to life.

card.name: Leonin Skyhunter
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.

card.name: Roar of the Kha
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. • Untap all creatures you control. Entwine {1}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Vault of Whispers
card.property: (Vault of Whispers isn't a spell.) {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ish Sah, den of the warlord Geth, commander of countless nim.

card.name: Barter in Blood
card.property: Each player sacrifices two creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the game of conquest, who cares about the pawns if the king yet reigns?"—Geth, keeper of the Vault

card.name: Talisman of Indulgence
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Talisman of Indulgence deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Sphere of Purity
card.property: If an artifact would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Icy Manipulator
card.property: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A model of Mirrodin in both shape and spirit.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Chosen
card.property: Protection from artifacts

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is my honor to keep safe Tel-Jilad's secrets, not to know them."

card.name: Vermiculos
card.property: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, Vermiculos gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin's artificial environment requires its own predators, scavengers, and senseless forces of nature.

card.name: Mirror Golem
card.property: Imprint — When Mirror Golem enters the battlefield, you may exile target card from a graveyard. Mirror Golem has protection from each of the exiled card's card types. (Artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal are card types.)

card.name: Regress
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once cast, a spell can be undone. But once revealed, a secret can never again be kept."—Pontifex, elder researcher

card.name: Awe Strike
card.property: The next time target creature would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stunned by the mere presence of the leonin kha, the nim raider quickly fell to its knees.

card.name: Cobalt Golem
card.property: {1} {U}: Cobalt Golem gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries before the first tides of the Quicksilver Sea rose to meet each new sun, Mirrodin's light shone on the golems alone.

card.name: Quicksilver Elemental
card.property: {U}: Quicksilver Elemental gains all activated abilities of target creature until end of turn. (If any of the abilities use that creature's name, use this creature's name instead.) You may spend blue mana as though it were mana of any color to pay the activation costs of Quicksilver Elemental's abilities.

card.name: Island
card.property: U

card.name: Thought Prison
card.property: Imprint — When Thought Prison enters the battlefield, you may have target player reveal his or her hand. If you do, choose a nonland card from it and exile that card. Whenever a player casts a spell that shares a color or converted mana cost with the exiled card, Thought Prison deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Override
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Knowledge Pool has all the answers—especially ‘No.'"

card.name: Spoils of the Vault
card.property: Choose a card name. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with that name, then put that card into your hand. Exile all other cards revealed this way, and you lose 1 life for each of the exiled cards.

card.name: Steel Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We sculpt the land into what we need—homes, armament, fortresses of war. Our strength comes not only from knowing, but from commanding the terrain."—Raksha Golden Cub, leonin kha

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Worldslayer
card.property: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy all permanents other than Worldslayer. Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Fabricate
card.property: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secret to invention is to see something in your mind, then find where it hides in the world."

card.name: Nim Shambler
card.property: Nim Shambler gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Nim Shambler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Called "the Dross" by its inhabitants, Mephidross is home to the nim, Mirrodin's mindless, ravenous undead.

card.name: Predator's Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you hear it coming, you're not its prey.

card.name: Fractured Loyalty
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, that spell or ability's controller gains control of that creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Sword of Kaldra
card.property: Equipped creature gets +5/+5. Whenever equipped creature deals damage to a creature, exile that creature. (Exile it only if it's still on the battlefield.) Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Razor Barrier
card.property: Target permanent you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We protect our homelands. Why should they not protect us?"

card.name: Viridian Longbow
card.property: Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player." Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Tel-Jilad Stylus
card.property: {T}: Put target permanent you own on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Etched on Tel-Jilad's trunk is an entire history of Mirrodin—except for an expanse near the ground scrubbed smooth by an unknown hand.

card.name: Annul
card.property: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Murder of the living is tragic, but murder of the idea is unforgivable."—Janus, speaker of the synod

card.name: Grid Monitor
card.property: You can't cast creature spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken protect the Knowledge Pool at any cost.

card.name: Plated Slagwurm
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath the Tangle, the wurm tunnels stretch . . . wide as a stone's throw, long as forever, deep as you dare.

card.name: Loxodon Mender
card.property: {W}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok believe that in the hands of a loxodon, no weapon can be broken.

card.name: Gate to the Aether
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card, the player may put it onto the battlefield.

card.name: Plains
card.property: W

card.name: Luminous Angel
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Somber Hoverguard
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken interrogate all intruders—once the hoverguards are done with them.

card.name: Loxodon Peacekeeper
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, the player with the lowest life total gains control of Loxodon Peacekeeper. If two or more players are tied for lowest life total, you choose one of them, and that player gains control of Loxodon Peacekeeper.

card.name: Grab the Reins
card.property: Choose one — • Until end of turn, you gain control of target creature and it gains haste. • Sacrifice a creature. Grab the Reins deals damage equal to that creature's power to target creature or player. Entwine {2}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Cloudpost
card.property: Cloudpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool for each Locus on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He watches from above. He watches from below. He watches from within."—Inscription on Tel-Jilad, the Tree of Tales

card.name: Myr Incubator
card.property: {6}, {T}, Sacrifice Myr Incubator: Search your library for any number of artifact cards, exile them, then create that many 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tower of Fortunes
card.property: {8}, {T}: Draw four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ur-golem etchings begin by celebrating Mirrodin's creator, a golem of almost limitless power. They end by cursing its protector, a being called Memnarch.

card.name: Terror
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A simple trap in a dark corner of the mind, and their nightmares catch up with them."—Geth, keeper of the Vault

card.name: Sunbeam Spellbomb
card.property: {W}, Sacrifice Sunbeam Spellbomb: You gain 5 life. {1}, Sacrifice Sunbeam Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cure that which was never ill."—Spellbomb inscription

card.name: Timesifter
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, each player exiles the top card of his or her library. The player who exiled the card with the highest converted mana cost takes an extra turn after this one. If two or more players' cards are tied for highest cost, the tied players repeat this process until the tie is broken.

card.name: Loxodon Punisher
card.property: Loxodon Punisher gets +2/+2 for each Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The loxodons believe punishment comes in two steps: pain and atonement. They carry a weapon for each.

card.name: Pewter Golem
card.property: {1} {B}: Regenerate Pewter Golem.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries before the first chimneys of Mephidross belched clouds of toxic gas, only the golems' movements stirred the air of Mirrodin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok, like the vedalken, are on a constant quest for knowledge. It is their currency, their trade, their life.

card.name: Shatter
card.property: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Days of planning. Weeks of building. Months of perfecting. Seconds of smashing.

card.name: Hum of the Radix
card.property: Each artifact spell costs {1} more to cast for each artifact its controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves learned long ago that anything left here slowly vanishes. Now it is a sacred site where the dead are laid to rest and where unnatural magic is erased forever.

card.name: Altar of Shadows
card.property: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Altar of Shadows. {7}, {T}: Destroy target creature. Then put a charge counter on Altar of Shadows.

card.name: Fatespinner
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player chooses draw step, main phase, or combat phase. The player skips each instance of the chosen step or phase this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knows what she is watching, but she never takes her eyes off it.

card.name: Rule of Law
card.property: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Appointed by the kha himself, members of the tribunal ensure all disputes are settled with the utmost fairness.

card.name: Clockwork Vorrac
card.property: Trample Clockwork Vorrac enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Vorrac attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Vorrac.

card.name: Krark's Thumb
card.property: If you would flip a coin, instead flip two coins and ignore one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can think of one goblin it ain't so lucky for."—Slobad, goblin tinkerer

card.name: Temporal Cascade
card.property: Choose one — • Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library. • Each player draws seven cards. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Blinkmoth Urn
card.property: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, if Blinkmoth Urn is untapped, that player adds {C} to his or her mana pool for each artifact he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken embed such urns in their living artifact creations.

card.name: Promise of Power
card.property: Choose one — • You draw five cards and you lose 5 life. • Create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying, where X is the number of cards in your hand. Entwine {4} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Wurmskin Forger
card.property: When Wurmskin Forger enters the battlefield, distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes three weeks for a patrol of hunters to down a slagwurm. It takes just as long to make a single cut in its hide.

card.name: Megatog
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Megatog gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In an ironic bit of evolution, the megatog's dozens of teeth are mainly ornamental. It prefers swallowing things whole.

card.name: Gilded Lotus
card.property: {T}: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Over such beauty, wars are fought. With such power, wars are won.

card.name: Vedalken Archmage
card.property: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Knowledge Pool knows. Memnarch understands."—Janus, speaker of the synod

card.name: Krark-Clan Grunt
card.property: Sacrifice an artifact: Krark-Clan Grunt gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more weapons a goblin breaks in battle, the more respected he becomes.

card.name: Bloodscent
card.property: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To study the predators of the Tangle, two people are required: one to watch from above, and one to run like hell.

card.name: Solar Tide
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less. • Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. Entwine—Sacrifice two lands. (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Scrabbling Claws
card.property: {T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her graveyard. {1}, Sacrifice Scrabbling Claws: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Dross Harvester
card.property: Protection from white At the beginning of your end step, you lose 4 life. Whenever a creature dies, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Talisman of Dominance
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Talisman of Dominance deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Mind's Eye
card.property: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ideas drift like petals on the wind. I have only to lift my face to the breeze."

card.name: Culling Scales
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy target nonland permanent with the lowest converted mana cost. (If two or more permanents are tied for lowest cost, target any one of them.)

card.name: Sylvan Scrying
card.property: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One glimpse of an elf's home lasts her weeks away in the wild.

card.name: Goblin Striker
card.property: First strike, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no word in the goblin language for "strategy." Then again, there's no word in the goblin language for "word."

card.name: Journey of Discovery
card.property: Choose one — • Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library. • You may play up to two additional lands this turn. Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Taj-Nar Swordsmith
card.property: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Psychic Membrane
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Psychic Membrane blocks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken always put their best thought forward.

card.name: March of the Machines
card.property: Each noncreature artifact is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.)

card.name: Tower of Champions
card.property: {8}, {T}: Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ur-golem runes tell of the transformation of Mirrodin's warden from silent guardian to merciless god.

card.name: Rustmouth Ogre
card.property: Whenever Rustmouth Ogre deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has an iron stomach. Literally.

card.name: Gold Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The leonin thought of the myr as omens, never imagining the sinister fate they foretold.

card.name: Thoughtcast
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

card.name: Tempest of Light
card.property: Destroy all enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This world reeks of another's hand. Someone or something is defying the power of the gods and shaping this planet. I intend for it to stop."—Glissa Sunseeker

card.name: Neurok Familiar
card.property: Flying When Neurok Familiar enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

card.name: Detonate
card.property: Destroy target artifact with converted mana cost X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins have forty-two different words for "ow."

card.name: Slagwurm Armor
card.property: Equipped creature gets +0/+6. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Forest
card.property: G

card.name: Groffskithur
card.property: Whenever Groffskithur becomes blocked, you may return target card named Groffskithur from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It growls not to threaten, but to summon.

card.name: Nim Devourer
card.property: Nim Devourer gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control. {B}{B}: Return Nim Devourer from your graveyard to the battlefield, then sacrifice a creature. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Leonin Sun Standard
card.property: {1} {W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The commander tells the troops where to go, but the standard reminds them why they're there.

card.name: Ancient Den
card.property: (Ancient Den isn't a spell.) {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Taj-Nar, throne of Raksha Golden Cub, destined leader of the leonin prides.

card.name: Glissa Sunseeker
card.property: First strike {T}: Destroy target artifact if its converted mana cost is equal to the amount of mana in your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's a secret at the heart of this world, and I will unlock it."

card.name: Auriok Bladewarden
card.property: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Auriok Bladewarden's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok have learned through constant struggle that allies are more precious than water.

card.name: Platinum Angel
card.property: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its heart lies the secret of immortality.

card.name: Fiery Gambit
card.property: Flip a coin until you lose a flip or choose to stop flipping. If you lose a flip, Fiery Gambit has no effect. If you win one or more flips, Fiery Gambit deals 3 damage to target creature. If you win two or more flips, Fiery Gambit deals 6 damage to each opponent. If you win three or more flips, draw nine cards and untap all lands you control.

card.name: Talisman of Impulse
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Talisman of Impulse deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Pyrite Spellbomb
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Pyrite Spellbomb deals 2 damage to target creature or player. {1}, Sacrifice Pyrite Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Melt that which was never frozen."—Spellbomb inscription

card.name: Copperhoof Vorrac
card.property: Copperhoof Vorrac gets +1/+1 for each untapped permanent your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like all forest beasts, it lives by one rule: if there's no room to grow, make some.

card.name: Slith Bloodletter
card.property: Whenever Slith Bloodletter deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{B}: Regenerate Slith Bloodletter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins fear the slith, believing they are children banished from the womb of the Steel Mother, deep within Kuldotha.

card.name: Leonin Abunas
card.property: Artifacts you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only leonin clerics who can survive the Razor Fields for one turning of the suns can stand in the Cave of Light.

card.name: Soul Foundry
card.property: Imprint — When Soul Foundry enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your hand. {X}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of the exiled card. X is the converted mana cost of that card.

card.name: Skeleton Shard
card.property: {3}, {T} or {B}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Metal permeates the marrow of every bone in Mephidross—except one.

card.name: Looming Hoverguard
card.property: Flying When Looming Hoverguard enters the battlefield, put target artifact on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although mute, hoverguards get their message across loud and clear.

card.name: Forest
card.property: G

card.name: Trash for Treasure
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Trash for Treasure, sacrifice an artifact. Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins generally have two possessions: one per hand.

card.name: Viridian Joiner
card.property: {T}: Add an amount of {G} to your mana pool equal to Viridian Joiner's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Tangle reaches out to itself constantly, forming new connections. We must follow its example."

card.name: Vulshok Gauntlets
card.property: Equipped creature gets +4/+2 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Auriok Steelshaper
card.property: Equip costs you pay cost {1} less. As long as Auriok Steelshaper is equipped, each creature you control that's a Soldier or a Knight gets +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They put their safety in his hands. He puts sharpened steel in theirs.

card.name: Ogre Leadfoot
card.property: Whenever Ogre Leadfoot becomes blocked by an artifact creature, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the goblins need more scrap for the Great Furnace, they simply let the ogres loose and follow in their wake.

card.name: Seething Song
card.property: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vulshok mana rituals echo the day when the red sun burst through Mirrodin's surface to take its place in the heavens.

card.name: Welding Jar
card.property: Sacrifice Welding Jar: Regenerate target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wires crawl over broken metal and heat themselves to melting, filling cracks quickly and efficiently.

card.name: Shared Fate
card.property: If a player would draw a card, that player exiles the top card of one of his or her opponents' libraries face down instead. Each player may look at and play cards he or she exiled with Shared Fate.

card.name: Duplicant
card.property: Imprint — When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

card.name: Chimney Imp
card.property: Flying When Chimney Imp dies, target opponent puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library.

card.name: Confusion in the Ranks
card.property: Whenever an artifact, creature, or enchantment enters the battlefield, its controller chooses target permanent another player controls that shares a card type with it. Exchange control of those permanents.

card.name: Necrogen Spellbomb
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice Necrogen Spellbomb: Target player discards a card. {1}, Sacrifice Necrogen Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forget that which was never known."—Spellbomb inscription

card.name: Empyrial Plate
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand. Equip {2}

card.name: Plains
card.property: W

card.name: Serum Tank
card.property: Whenever Serum Tank or another artifact enters the battlefield, put a charge counter on Serum Tank. {3}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Serum Tank: Draw a card.

card.name: Vulshok Berserker
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He experiences every emotion with passion and repays every slight with vengeance.

card.name: Wanderguard Sentry
card.property: When Wanderguard Sentry enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Created by the vedalken to guard Lumengrid, the drones' empty eyes look beyond the Quicksilver Sea.

card.name: Aether Spellbomb
card.property: {U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand. {1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Release that which was never caged."—Spellbomb inscription

card.name: Brown Ouphe
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a strange twist of fate, one of the most annoying creatures in the multiverse was brought to the place where it could cause the most damage.

card.name: Pentavus
card.property: Pentavus enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pentavus: Create a 1/1 colorless Pentavite artifact creature token with flying. {1}, Sacrifice a Pentavite: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pentavus.

card.name: Leonin Elder
card.property: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wisdom of the elders is just as much a weapon as a sword or spear. We must learn to wield it."—Ushanti, leonin seer

card.name: Tooth of Chiss-Goria
card.property: Flash Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Trolls of Tel-Jilad
card.property: {1} {G}: Regenerate target green creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secret of this world weighs upon us, and we have been shaped by time and duty to bear it."

card.name: Needlebug
card.property: Flash Protection from artifacts

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Near Tel-Jilad, the Tangle is almost silent, save for the trolls' chants and the skittering of needlebugs.

card.name: Leaden Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Moriok saw the myr as fellow scavengers, never knowing just who the myr were scavenging for.

card.name: Incite War
card.property: Choose one — • Creatures target player controls attack this turn if able. • Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Sculpting Steel
card.property: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.

card.name: Moriok Scavenger
card.property: When Moriok Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many go to Mephidross in search of lost riches. Most end up as part of the cache.

card.name: Inertia Bubble
card.property: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wouldn't want you to hurt yourself."—Bruenna, Neurok leader

card.name: Sun Droplet
card.property: Whenever you're dealt damage, put that many charge counters on Sun Droplet. At the beginning of each upkeep, you may remove a charge counter from Sun Droplet. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Iron Myr
card.property: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins didn't think of the myr at all, which allowed the myr to observe everywhere unhindered.

card.name: Lightning Coils
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put a charge counter on Lightning Coils. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Lightning Coils has five or more charge counters on it, remove all of them from it and create that many 3/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Duskworker
card.property: Whenever Duskworker becomes blocked, regenerate it. {3}: Duskworker gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the setting of each sun, it emerges to clean Mirrodin's floor of the day's carrion.

card.name: Lumengrid Sentinel
card.property: Flying Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may tap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken order their Neurok sentinels to watch over the shores of the Quicksilver Sea, as if they know of intruders yet to come.

card.name: Nightmare Lash
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each Swamp you control. Equip—Pay 3 life. (Pay 3 life: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Nim Shrieker
card.property: Flying Nim Shrieker gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As imps they were an annoyance. As nim they are a pestilence.

card.name: Living Hive
card.property: Trample Whenever Living Hive deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its center is a single red ant, a queen that regulates the hive's movements.

card.name: Flayed Nim
card.property: Whenever Flayed Nim deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses that much life. {2}{B}: Regenerate Flayed Nim.

card.name: Raise the Alarm
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The nim raid our homes without warning. We must defend our homes without hesitation."

card.name: Dross Prowler
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would never have believed that on a world with four suns there could exist a place so dark."—Glissa Sunseeker

card.name: Spellweaver Helix
card.property: Imprint — When Spellweaver Helix enters the battlefield, you may exile two target sorcery cards from a single graveyard. Whenever a player casts a card, if it has the same name as one of the cards exiled with Spellweaver Helix, you may copy the other. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Forest
card.property: G

card.name: Myr Prototype
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Myr Prototype. Myr Prototype can't attack or block unless you pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Elf Replica
card.property: {1} {G}, Sacrifice Elf Replica: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Dross Scorpion
card.property: Whenever Dross Scorpion or another artifact creature dies, you may untap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They skitter out of the mists to consume fresh kill before Mephidross has a chance to corrode it away.

card.name: Talisman of Progress
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Talisman of Progress deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Irradiate
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The blast ignores the cage of metal but devours the flesh inside.

card.name: Battlegrowth
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would gladly die for the forest, but I'm much better at killing for it."

card.name: Tanglebloom
card.property: {1}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Druids converted swaths of the Tangle into tanglebloom orchards. Though heavy tools are needed to cut a leaf in the Tangle, tanglebloom fruit is easily plucked by hand.

card.name: Island
card.property: U

card.name: Goblin War Wagon
card.property: Goblin War Wagon doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}. If you do, untap Goblin War Wagon.

card.name: Goblin Replica
card.property: {3} {R}, Sacrifice Goblin Replica: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Bottle Gnomes
card.property: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Island
card.property: U

card.name: Myr Retriever
card.property: When Myr Retriever dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mephidross gives up treasure easily . . . as long as you take its place.

card.name: Yotian Soldier
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Poets dream the verses of otherworldly stories. Artificers dream the blueprints of otherplanar artifacts.

card.name: Mountain
card.property: R

card.name: Grim Reminder
card.property: Search your library for a nonland card and reveal it. Each opponent who cast a card this turn with the same name as that card loses 6 life. Then shuffle your library. {B}{B}: Return Grim Reminder from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: One Dozen Eyes
card.property: Choose one — • Create a 5/5 green Beast creature token. • Create five 1/1 green Insect creature tokens. Entwine {G}{G}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Scythe of the Wretched
Tree of Tales
card.property: (Tree of Tales isn't a spell.) {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tel-Jilad, sanctum of the ancient trolls, keepers of the secret of Mirrodin's origin.

card.name: Clockwork Beetle
card.property: Clockwork Beetle enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Beetle attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat.

card.name: Nim Replica
card.property: {2} {B}, Sacrifice Nim Replica: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Hematite Golem
card.property: {1} {R}: Hematite Golem gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries before the first peaks of the Oxidda Chain rewrote the laws of magnetism, the golems patrolled Mirrodin's featureless surface unhindered.

card.name: Assert Authority
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: War Elemental
card.property: When War Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless an opponent was dealt damage this turn. Whenever an opponent is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on War Elemental.

card.name: Myr Enforcer
card.property: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most myr monitor other species. Some myr monitor other myr.

card.name: Neurok Spy
card.property: Neurok Spy can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the murk of Mephidross to the heart of Kuldotha, the vedalken send their servants forth to gather knowledge from every inch of Mirrodin.

card.name: Seat of the Synod
card.property: (Seat of the Synod isn't a spell.) {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lumengrid, site of the Knowledge Pool, source of vedalken arcana.

card.name: Wail of the Nim
card.property: Choose one — • Regenerate each creature you control. • Wail of the Nim deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Entwine {B} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Leonin Scimitar
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mask of Memory
card.property: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard a card. Equip {1}

card.name: Fists of the Anvil
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gron's mind reeled with possibilities, most of which are best left unmentioned.

card.name: Disarm
card.property: Unattach all Equipment from target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be thankful I left you your clothes."

card.name: Wall of Blood
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Pay 1 life: Wall of Blood gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Leonin Bladetrap
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) {2}, Sacrifice Leonin Bladetrap: Leonin Bladetrap deals 2 damage to each attacking creature without flying.

card.name: Cathodion
card.property: When Cathodion dies, add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cathodions repair the Great Furnace by soldering parts of themselves to the mechanism. Eventually, they become one with the machine.

card.name: Power Conduit
card.property: {T}, Remove a counter from a permanent you control: Choose one — • Put a charge counter on target artifact. • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never content, vedalken artificers continually tinker with their creations.

card.name: Consume Spirit
card.property: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to target creature or player and you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mephidross changes all who dwell there, taking their lives and adding them to its own.

card.name: Lumengrid Augur
card.property: {1}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card. If that player discards an artifact card this way, untap Lumengrid Augur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Information pumps like blood through vedalken society.
